traffic signs.explanation: This sign informs the driver about upcoming road conditions that may require reduced speed and caution around the curve.

traffic cones.explanation: These cones are directing the traffic flow and reducing lane width, which may require the ego vehicle to adjust speed and maintain a safe distance from the cones to avoid collision.

barriers.description: White and blue metal barriers separating the sidewalk from the roadway where pedestrians are present.
barriers.explanation: These barriers ensure that pedestrians remain within the safe pedestrian zone and do not enter the roadway, allowing the ego vehicle to maintain a steady course without worrying about pedestrian incursion into the traffic lane.

other objects.description: There are lane dividers on the road, which separate traffic directions and lanes, presenting no immediate obstacle.
other objects.explanation: They are part of the normal road infrastructure and should be acknowledged for lane positioning.
